column5: Sorry if this is the wrong location for, Mods feel free to move it if need be.  I've got a canoe located in Toronto that needs to come up to Red Lake.  I won't ship Kevlar as freight so it looks like it needs to hitch a ride.  If anyone is heading to Thunder Bay, Winnipeg or somewhere around there in the next few weeks, please send me a PM.  I'm willing to pay a good chunk of your fuel bill for the trouble.  Cheers, Brookie
Sorry I don't plan to be up that way till late summer. I'm hoping someone here can help you out.
